scripts.script_content: Well, I guess some folks might say it is harder than ever these days out there in the world. Here's Cass Daley with her song A Good Man Is Hard to Find and we're wondering if she has a point about that title right here.

Ladies and gentlemen, I think we can all relate when this song says a good man is hard to find. You know who you are out there the fine folks holding things together in these tough times of ours. Here's that timeless tune by Cass Daley for your listening pleasure tonight: A Good Man Is Hard to Find.
